name: Sala - Swamp
text: You discard one card and target one card on the field; Destroy that card, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Sala Token" (Level 3/EARTH ATK 100/DEF 100). This token cannot be used for the Summon of a monster, except a "Sala -" monster. You can only use the effect of "Sala - Swamp" once per turn.
